content: couch coaster designed by crochetcrafters1 © 2024 crochetcrafters1 - all rights reserved this pattern and its contents are only for personal use do not copy edit redistribute or sell this pattern you are welcome to sell finished products with your own photos in small quantities but if you do so please give pattern credit to crochetcrafters1 thank you and enjoy stitches and abbreviations - this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches chain chain half_double_crochet half_double_crochet tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn - orange - yarn needle - scissors final size - each coaster is a square with a 9 cm width technical notes *all pieces are worked back and forth in row *you chain 1 at the start of each row *at the end of each row is a stitch count in brackets *chains are not included in the stitch count bottom of chair orange make at least 5 row 1 chain 13 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each chain across 12 sts row 2-10 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet in each st across 12 sts *fasten_off and weave in the yarn tails backrest orange make 1 row 1 chain 13 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each chain across 12 sts row 2-10 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet in each st across 12 sts *fasten_off fold in half sew shut and sew to the back of one of the squares armrests orange make 2 row 1 chain 13 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each chain across 12 sts row 2-5 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet in each st across 12 sts *fasten_off fold in half sew shut and sew to the sides of the square link to video https //youtu be/khjr-d-yr2a if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
